app.name: ClaudeCode-Debugger
app.description: Smart debug prompt generator for Claude Code
cli.interactive_prompt: Enter your error message (Ctrl+D to finish):
error.title: üö® {type} Error - {severity} Priority
debug.analyze_desc:
- Identify root cause
- Check common patterns
- Review recent changes
- Determine impact scope
debug.investigate_desc:
- Reproduce error conditions
- Collect relevant logs
- Check system state
- Verify environment config
debug.fix_desc:
- Apply appropriate fix
- Test solution
- Verify no side effects
- Document resolution
debug.prevent_desc:
- Add tests to prevent recurrence
- Update documentation
- Consider refactoring if needed
- Implement monitoring
tips.title: üí° Debug Tips
tips.content:
- Use binary search to locate issues
- Check recent commits
- Review related log files
- Try reproducing in different environments
- Consult team member experiences
info.title: üìù Need More Information
info.content:
For more precise help, please provide:
- Full error stack
- Reproduction steps
- Environment information
- Recent changes
agent.use: Use `{agent}` agent to handle this error
